nodes.text: Hurdenn's Rodian mistress was a female Rodian living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY she was living on Taris, where she became a mistress of the Imperial Moff Hurdenn. Lieutenant Pierce, working under Hurdenn's command, learned about the affair and blackmailed Hurden into transferring him to serve under the Emperor's Wrath, far away from Taris.
Hurdenn's Rodian mistress is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during a Sith Warrior-class-exclusive companion mission of Lieutenant Pierce.
